New Records: Tristan Stubbs scored his maiden ODI century in 75 balls
Key Match Events: Ireland lost half of their side within 10 overs
Tristan Stubbs remained unbeaten at 112 runs off 81 balls, striking eight fours and three sixes
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa chose to bat first
Ireland were chasing a target of 344
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa finished their innings at 343/4 in the allotted 50 overs
Ireland were 90/7 after 19 overs, needing 254 runs to win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tristan Stubbs' innings was a notable performance
The game was played at Sheikh Zayed Stadium in Abu Dhabi on Friday, October 4
Others: Ryan Rickelton made 40 runs off 39 balls
Kyle Verreynne delivered an impressive performance, scoring 67 runs off 64 balls
